-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Snaplet for Facebook's Haxl
--   
--   A Snaplet for the integration of Haxl DataSources with Snap.
@package snaplet-haxl
@version 0.0.0.2

module Snap.Snaplet.Haxl
haxlInit :: Env e -> SnapletInit b (HaxlEnv e)
withHaxl :: HasHaxl m => GenHaxl () b -> m (b)
data HaxlEnv u
HaxlEnv :: Env u -> HaxlEnv u
en :: HaxlEnv u -> Env u
class MonadCatchIO m => HasHaxl m
getHaxlState :: HasHaxl m => m (HaxlEnv ())
instance MonadCatchIO m => HasHaxl (ReaderT (HaxlEnv ()) m)
instance HasHaxl (Handler b (HaxlEnv ()))
